name: Jelly Swing 3D
description:
You’re running straight towards a hole! Tap to use your rope and sling over the hole.
Catch some speed and swing like a true explorer to get even faster.

Use a new rope rider every time. Is your character using a lasso, a grappling hook, a spider web? Who knows? All that matters is that you can make them swing like champs, and grab all the bonuses you can on this 3D cave exploration adventure.

Never stop swinging!
